name: Little Timmy's Dream
description:
It seems like little Timmy is sleeping very deeply again!

Help him get through his dream and find the exit!  But beware, the dreams of a six-year-old aren't just full of fluffy sheep and cotton candy clouds...

a game created in two days for the Manasoup Gamejam 2022

- there will be a patch in the next few days -

CodeErwin Trot (cyclingtohell)ArtLea Melzer (hvairn)
Elias Menzel (DuneDiver)SoundJulian Aconi
